name: Hunting Grounds (itch)
description:
You are a tiger who has to hunt deer to survive. If there are too many deer, then they will eat up all the grass and die out. If there are less than two deer left on the board, they cannot multiply and die out. 

Meanwhile, the village around expands and shifts in territory, causing you and the deer to have less space.

This is our submission for Ludum Dare 42: Running out of space.

We made for the Jam, and this was our first time participating in it! 

We hope you have fun playing this! Constructive feedback much appreciated!

Programming: Rohan
Art: Supriya

Controls:
move/attack: arrow keys
begin game: enter
restart: escape (and go to the title screen)
quite game: press Q at the title screen
